title: Samplesheet schema validation
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 (forward reads) must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'. If this is meant to be a run of mikrokondo with long read data please specify the paths under long_reads

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 (reverse reads) cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

long_reads.errorMessage: FastQ file for long reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

assembly.errorMessage: Fasta file, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa.gz' or '.fasta.gz'.
